title: GTA IV With Extras
description:
-------------------------------GTA IV With Extras-------------------------------

Hi everone,This is my first torrent so go easy.

I have noticed many people have been having a lot of problems with
the gta iv crack procedure (Drunken cam,vehicle handling problems,the game crashing and so on)
I guess i was one of the lucky ones who have been able to play this game with no problems AT ALL.
So  i thought i would give somthing back to the community.

My upload of this game works perfectly and i know this because i have been hammering it for like 8 hours 
staight today with ZERO problems.

I don't know exactly where the crack came from because i have downloaded so many useless ones i have lost track
but the crack files i have included DO work!

I HOPE YOU ALL ENJOY THIS AND PLEASE SEEEEEDDDDD!!!!!

I CAN'T GIVE ANY CRED TO ANY CRACKERS BECAUSE I CAN'T REMEMBER WHERE I GOT MINE FROM.BUT THANK-YOU TO ALL YOU
HARD WORKING CRACKERS OUT THERE!!!!!!

Note:Nothing in this torrent is by me,I have simply uploaded this content.

----------------------------------WHATS INCLUDED---------------------

-Both GTA IV Disks
-The crack files
-Replacement xinput dll's (so other controlers and not not just xbox ones work)
-GTA IV Guide

----------------------------INSTALATION INSTRUCTIONS-------------------------

1.mount both GTA disks with an iso manager(PowerISO or somthing)
2.Go to My comuter and right click on GTA IV DISK 1 and click install or run program.
3.Follow installation instructions.(Be sure to create a ROCKSTAR SOCIAL CLUB ACCOUNT or else the game won't run)
4.When installation is complete,go to the CRACK folder in this download and follow instuctions inside the README.txt
5.click on LaunchGTAIV in the games Dir and ENJOY!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
A FEW NOTES:

TO SAVE YOUR GAME-
                  When the game asks you to save,create an offline live account.
=================================

Controlls-
          I downloaded a torrent that replaces old files in your sys32 dir(Noted above) that is used by windows live so other controllers can be used(I have scanned and thested these files and they are clean and work!)
=================================          
INSTALLATION PROBLEMS-
                       If you come across an error that states somthing about cab files not matching or somthing during the installation it meansthe torrent is not complete.Open your torrent client and force a re-check.If the game showup 99.(whatever) or somthing like that then it's not complete an i am right! If not,then iam the fool!
================================

THATS IT! i HOPE YOU ALL ENJOY AND PLEASE,SEEEEEEEEDD OR I WILL FIND YOU AND KILL YOU PERSONALLY! (jOKES!)
